comments.body: nit: Would be nice if the `description` section were a bit more contained. Recommend using `description: |` and indenting text to fit underneath. This should improve readability. Here's a [good example]( https://github.com/conda-forge/willow-feedstock/blob/6add334d5a8d297b0b078b5f2433ce6a5de17f28/recipe/meta.yaml#L35-L38 ).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@Python 2.7+

This software was written by Malthe Borch <mborch@gmail.com>. The pyfsevents module by Nicolas Dumazet was used for reference."
  doc_url: 'https://github.com/malthe/macfsevents'
  dev_url: 'https://github.com/malthe/macfsevents'

comments.body: nit: Very minor suggestion. Seems there is an extra space between `install` and the first argument. Would suggest cutting it to one space.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  number: 0
  skip: True  # [not osx]
  script: python setup.py install  --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
